meanings.definition: The number equivalent to the sum of two and three.
meanings.sent1: I have a collection of stickers, and there are exactly five red ones.
meanings.sent2: There are five fingers on each hand.
meanings.sent3: I asked for five cookies, but the baker gave me ten by mistake!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, splitting the silence into five distinct parts.
meanings.sent5: The five bright stars in the night sky formed a perfect pentagon.

meanings.definition: A group or set of five things.
meanings.sent1: The family of ducks waddled by, consisting of five fluffy ducklings.
meanings.sent2: She picked up a handful of marbles, and there were exactly five in her palm.
meanings.sent3: The five colorful balloons floated away, leaving the party without decorations.
meanings.sent4: The five petals of the flower danced in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The five books on the shelf stood in a neat row, waiting to be read.

meanings.sent1: I will add five more candies to the jar to make it full.
meanings.sent2: She decided to raise her hand and bid five dollars more in the auction.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand, and the rabbit multiplied into five!
meanings.sent4: His smile widened, stretching his face into five times its usual size.
meanings.sent5: The sun slowly climbed, painting the sky with five shades of orange.
